questList.questDescription: Venture into the heart of The Forsaken Fields and confront the twisted abomination known as Morghul. Will you destroy this Plague Ooze or bend it to your will?
Seek out Krag, the formidable Rock Troll of The Twisted Beasts. Gain his allegiance to fortify your strength against the light.
Exorcise the malevolent spirit known as Wraithus, the Worldbinder Phantom, from these cursed lands to weaken the forces of light.
Face the fearsome Ignis, the Firebrand Salamander. Will you extinguish its flames or turn its fiery wrath against your foes?
Form an alliance with Pyros, the Fire Drake. His fiery breath will be a formidable addition to your arsenal.
Bring an end to Infernos, the Balrug Fiend, to lessen the infernal strength of the Devil's Brigade.
Confront Aurelius the Undying in the heart of the Sanctum of Despair. Destroy him to shatter the Heart of Light and plunge the world into eternal darkness.
Persuade Gabriel, the Macewielding Angel, to join your cause. His holy power could be a devastating weapon against the light.
Eliminate Thamiel, the Titanic Brawler, to weaken the holy defenders and pave the way to ultimate victory.
